publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4794.1 David McLetchie: Congratulations to Standard Life—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4794) in the name of Jim Mather, insert at end "but notes that on 31 March 2004 Alex Salmond MP described the demutualisation of Standard Life, without which it could not have joined the FTSE 100, as "a sad, bad day for the Scottish financial sector", and calls on the SNP to state whether this remains the official view of the party."

S2M-4794.1 David McLetchie: Congratulations to Standard Life—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4794) in the name of Jim Mather, insert at end "but notes that on 31 March 2004 Alex Salmond MP described the demutualisation of Standard Life, without which it could not have joined the FTSE 100, as "a sad, bad day for the Scottish financial sector", and calls on the SNP to state whether this remains the official view of the party."
S2M-4794.1 Congratulations to Standard Life (lodged on 14 September 2006) Mr Brian Monteith*
